ABOUT ME

I am currently a fourth-year student at University of Maryland studying Computer Science and Math. On campus, I am an undergraduate researcher and teaching assistant in the computer science department. Previously, I was an intern at JHU Applied Physics Lab and JPMorgan Chase. After graduation, I will be working on research at UCLA's Institute for Pure and Applied Mathematics, and then starting my first "real job" as a software engineer in Pittsburgh, PA. My next goal is to get into grad school. I am passionate about journaling and documenting my experiences, which you can read about on my blog!
